sen.e: However, it still did not resolve the issue of absolute shortfall of classrooms; on the other hand, there was the trend of education spending being cut back due to the inflation of military spending which became necessary to be prepared against Russian Empire which kept expanding southward at the time.

sen.e: More specifically, it was a system in which each class in each grade was divided into the morning class and the afternoon class, which were taught by the same teacher, respectively; since this was a unique system in Japan at the time, it drew attention.

sen.e: Other than the above, he actively increased female teachers, in the midst of the strong trend to keep out and disfavor female teachers, from the belief that "as long as an elementary school is an extension of home, maternal love is essential for cultivation of children".
